I think that although an increasing lack of intrest in the rpg is 
definately noticable, that is not the main reason for the number of 
posts having been chopped down. It's probably more due to the fact 
that we changed the number of characters maximum. When you have 5 
chars max (and not everyone has 5 chars yet) rather than 15 chars, a 
significant difference shouldbe, and is, present. =)


--- In nbwrpg@y..., Legendarynemasis@a... wrote:
> The RPG is dieing because there is nothing new to it. Same place 
heading 
> along the same lines as the old one. Yet noone listens to me and 
look at how 
> the posts have been chopped down? Ah well I guess some people will 
never 
> learn.
